Class View

    • view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements BasicView, CmdObserver, StateObserver, FeatureReceiver

    Goh Khian Wei, Ben lawrence, Joshua Medway

      • addLine

        public void addLine​(int index,
                    Coordinate start,
                    Coordinate end)
        This is called to to tell the view to add a line to the turtle arena starting at start coordinate and ending at end coordinate. The line belongs to the turtle with the given index.
        Specified by:
        addLine in interface MovementView
        Parameters:
        index - - Index of the turtle whose movement caused the line to be drawn
        start - - Start coordinate in SLogo coordinates of line
        end - - end coordinate in SLogo coordinates of line

      • updateCmd

        public void updateCmd​(java.lang.String cmd)
        Update command used for the observer based design pattern. The terminal prompt text box sends commands to the backend asynchronously, and are sent via this method.
        Specified by:
        updateCmd in interface CmdObserver
        Parameters:
        cmd - Verbatim command that the user has input
